body.p: includes a built-in JSON validator that is used to validate JSON documents against JSON Schemas, as well as a built-in JSON Well-Formedness validator (based on the free JAVA source code available at www.json.org). A built-in JSON Schematron Validator engine is also provided to validate JSON documents against a specified Schematron schema. Validation for JSON documents works in both Text mode and Author mode.
